about_the_game:
Fastraq is a sci-fi based high-speed anti-gravity racing game. Drive on roller coaster like tracks, overtake your opponents and engage in combat. Experience tight turns, 360 degree loops and intense combat.

Hyper-sonic mode

In hyper-sonic mode you race against 14 AI opponents at speeds of 2000 mph on roller coaster like loopy and curvy tracks.

Hyper-combat mode

In hyper-combat mode, you engage in intense machine to machine combat at speeds of 2000 mph with 14 AI opponents. You can use variety of weapons like plasma weapon or bullets to destroy your opponent.

Campaign

Dive straight into the campaign mode. Campaign consists of 20 unique levels. Each level is more difficult than the previous one. And you need to win a level to unlock the next one.

Vehicles

There are six different vehicles to choose from. Depending on the track you want to race, choose your vehicle and strategize your race to win it.

Features

  • Works well with a controller
  • Intense combat racing
  • Competitive AI
  • Roller coaster like tracks
  • 5 game modes
  • 5 levels of difficulty

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 4th Gen or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 970 4 GB
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 6th Gen or equivalent
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce RTX 2060 6 GB
  • Storage: 4 GB available space

name: Fastraq

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 or later
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 4th Gen or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 970 4 GB
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Game works well with both controller and keyboard. You might need to plug the controller after starting the game.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 or later
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 6th Gen or equivalent
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce RTX 2060 6 GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Game works well with both controller and keyboard. You might need to plug the controller after starting the game.

short_description: Fastraq is a high-speed anti-gravity racing game. Drive on roller coaster like tracks, overtake your opponents and engage in combat. Experience tight turns, 360 degree loops and intense combat.
